mapper.select: SELECT pd_no, (SELECT sub_name FROM SUB_CATEGORY_TB sct WHERE sct.SUB_NO = pt.sub_no) SUB_NAME, (SELECT brand_name FROM BRAND_TB bt WHERE bt.BRAND_NO = pt.BRAND_NO) brand_name, pd_name, pd_views, pd_date, pd_more FROM PRODUCTS_TB pt where pd_no = #{pd_no}

SELECT min(DFST.dfs_no) dfs_no, dfst.DFS_NAME, min(PBDFST.pd_by_dfs_price) price, min(PBDFST.pd_by_dfs_sale) sale_percent, min(PBDFST.pd_by_dfs_price)*(1 - min(PBDFST.pd_by_dfs_sale)/100) total_price FROM PRODUCTS_BY_DUTY_FREE_SHOP_TB pbdfst, DUTY_FREE_SHOP_TB dfst WHERE pbdfst.dfs_no = dfst.DFS_NO AND PBDFST.pd_no = #{pd_no} GROUP BY DFST.DFS_NAME ORDER BY dfs_no
SELECT c.CP_NAME, ctt.CP_TYPE_NAME CP_UNIT, c.DISCOUNT_AMT, c.DFS_NO FROM COUPON c, COUPON_TYPE_TB ctt WHERE c.CP_TYPE_NO = ctt.CP_TYPE_NO
